Name: Cascade
Info: The first long-term shield made to recharge in stations. \nIt lacks any regenerative capabilties while in the field.

Name: Shield Generator II
Info: Tech II of the basic shield generator. \nHas increased renegerative capabilties.

Name: Big Cascade
Info: The extended version of the Cascade, the Big Cascade can sustain many \nmore blows. It lacks any regenerative capabilties while in the field.

Name: Shield Generator III
Info: Tech III of the basic shield generator. \nHas increased renegerative capabilties.

Name: Fat One
Info: It lacks any regenerative capabilties while in the field.

Name: Shield Generator IV
Info: Tech IV of the basic shield generator. \nHas increased renegerative capabilties.

Name: The Wall
Info: It lacks any regenerative capabilties while in the field.

Name: Shield Generator V
Info: Tech V of the basic shield generator. \nHas increased renegerative capabilties.

Name: Phalanx
Info: The ultimate shield, at least as far as regeneration is concerned.
